p: Clinical presentations of hospitalized patients with the D34 variants ( n = 5) were classified as asymptomatic for one patient, upper respiratory tract infection (URTI) for 2 patients, and lower respiratory tract infection (LRTI, pneumonia) for 3 patients. To evaluate disease severity in relation to the D34 deletion, mild (asymptomatic and URTI, n = 5) versus severe COVID-19 (LRTI, n = 4) was compared by Fisher’s exact test. No significant difference in clinical presentation could be observed between hospitalized patients harbouring or not the ORF6 deletion ( p > 0.99).
